lead_paragraph: FIFA presidential candidate Gianni Infantino said on Monday he would not automatically choose a European to be his secretary general if he wins the election to lead world soccer this month, breaking a pattern dating back more than 100 years.

headline.print_headline: Infantino May Look Outside Europe for FIFA Right-Hand Man
headline.main: Infantino May Look Outside Europe for FIFA Right-Hand Man

snippet: FIFA presidential candidate Gianni Infantino said on Monday he would not automatically choose a European to be his secretary general if he wins the election to lead world soccer this month, breaking a pattern dating back more than 100 years....
